name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル3: 飢餓地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun - Reberu Surī: Kiga Jigoku

description: The third level of Impel Down prison, known as Starvation Hell. A barren wasteland of extreme heat where prisoners receive minimal food and water, causing them to gradually deteriorate. The heat rises from Level 4 below, making the environment nearly uninhabitable. Prisoners held here typically have bounties of 50,000,000 berries or higher.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Level 3 - Starvation Hell
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Buggy, and Mr. 3 fall through the floor and arrive at Level 3, experiencing its harsh heat and desolate conditions.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces one of the most brutal levels of Impel Down, showcasing the increasing severity as the group descends.

keyEvents.title: Saldeath's Debut
keyEvents.description: Chief Guard Saldeath confronts the intruders on Level 3, commanding his Blue Gorillas.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the level's dedicated guard force and security measures.

keyEvents.title: Saldeath's Seastone Net Trap
keyEvents.description: Saldeath springs his trap on Level 3, ensnaring Luffy's group in a Seastone net.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the specialized equipment and tactics used to contain Devil Fruit users on this level.

keyEvents.title: Bentham Found Imprisoned
keyEvents.description: Bentham (Mr. 2 Bon Kurei) is discovered imprisoned on Level 3, revealing his fate after the Alabasta arc.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that Level 3 houses prisoners like former Baroque Works agents with significant bounties.

statusHistory.reason: Level 3 is operational as part of Impel Down prison system

description: The headquarters of the World Government's military sea force, located at Marineford. It serves as the command center for Marine operations worldwide.

keyEvents.title: Sengoku and Garp Discuss Luffy's Infiltration
keyEvents.description: At Marine Headquarters, Sengoku berates Garp about Luffy's break-in to Impel Down, noting the unprecedented nature of the infiltration.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Marine leadership's reaction to Luffy's actions and the tension between Sengoku and Garp.

keyEvents.title: Ace and Luffy Confirmed as Brothers
keyEvents.description: Sengoku confirms to Garp that Luffy and Ace are brothers, connected by the 'D' in their names.
keyEvents.significance: Official Marine acknowledgment of the brotherhood between Luffy and Ace.
